alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 7:07PM MST until March 05 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northern Arizona including Tuba City, Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, Saint Johns, Springerville, Show Low, Pinetop, Dilkon, Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
